typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PECPECID as decimal(38,18),
		PECEXTKEY as string,
		PECCONTYP as string,
		PECCONPEAID as decimal(38,18),
		PECDEPITY as string,
		PECDEPINT as decimal(38,18),
		PECPROCOM as decimal(38,18),
		PECMANFEE as decimal(38,18),
		PECDUEDATE as decimal(38,18),
		PECNOOFYR as decimal(38,18),
		PECPROSW1 as string,
		PECNOUFYR as decimal(38,18),
		PECPROSW2 as string,
		PECCOFOPT as decimal(38,18),
		PECCOFOBL as string,
		PECIBNRPR as decimal(38,18),
		PECIYEAR as decimal(38,18),
		PECSW5 as string,
		PECPCAID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
